definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The application method and requirements for this getter has also been described.
sentences.chinese: 同时还叙述了该消气剂的使用方法和要求。

sentences.english: She told me to make a doilies to help ease myself every time I got angry at you.
sentences.chinese: 她让我每次生你的气时做一块花边桌垫来帮我消气。

sentences.english: If you find yourself filled with anger toward your spouse, then do the following rage reduction exercise.
sentences.chinese: 假如发现自己在生对方的气，请做下面的消气练习。

sentences.english: The best way to disarm your critics is to make them laugh.
sentences.chinese: 让批评你的人消气，最好的办法就是使他们笑。

sentences.english: The improved getter installation technology was adopted for improving the device sealing performance.
sentences.chinese: 改进的消气剂装配确保了器件的良好密封性能。

sentences.english: If the saint is annoyed, do not pray to him until he gets over it.
sentences.chinese: 要是圣徒恼了，在他消气之前不要向他祈祷。

definition: in a fit of anger (idiom); in a temper
to catch fire/to ignite/to detonate/to get angry
to be difficult with sb/to provoke disagreement/at loggerheads/to fall out with
to admit defeat/to give in/to acknowledge a mistake/to apologize/to be amenable to persuasion
to seethe/to sulk/to be pissed off (vulgar)
to admit an error/to acknowledge one's mistake
